Name: Les Misérables
Content: Based on Victor Hugo's novel, it follows the lives of several characters in 19th-century France, focusing on themes of justice, love, and redemption.
Characters: Jean Valjean, Javert, Cosette, Marius, Eponine.

Name: Hamilton
Content: A hip-hop musical that tells the story of Alexander Hamilton, one of the Founding Fathers of the United States.
Characters: Alexander Hamilton, Aaron Burr, Eliza Hamilton, George Washington.

Name: Cats
Content: Based on T.S. Eliot's "Old Possum's Book of Practical Cats," it's a musical about the Jellicle Cats gathering for the Jellicle Ball.
Characters: Grizabella, Rum Tum Tugger, Old Deuteronomy.

Name: Wicked
Content: A prequel to "The Wizard of Oz," it explores the untold story of the Wicked Witch of the West and Glinda the Good Witch.
Characters: Elphaba, Glinda, Fiyero.

Name: Rent
Content: A modern adaptation of Puccini's opera "La Bohème," focusing on a group of friends dealing with love, friendship, and HIV/AIDS in New York City.
Characters: Mark, Roger, Mimi, Maureen, Joanne.

Name: The Lion King
Content: An adaptation of Disney's animated film, it follows the journey of Simba, a young lion, as he grows up and learns about responsibility.
Characters: Simba, Nala, Mufasa, Scar, Timon, Pumbaa.

Name: West Side Story
Content: A modern-day Romeo and Juliet set in New York City, exploring the rivalry between two street gangs, the Jets and the Sharks.
Characters: Tony, Maria, Anita, Bernardo.

Name: Mamma Mia!
Content: A jukebox musical featuring the music of ABBA, it tells the story of a young woman's quest to discover the identity of her father before her wedding.
Characters: Donna, Sophie, Sam, Harry, Bill.

Name: Chicago
Content: A satirical look at fame, justice, and the media set in the Jazz Age, with a focus on two women accused of murder.
Characters: Roxie Hart, Velma Kelly, Billy Flynn, Mama Morton.

Name: Hairspray
Content: Set in the 1960s, the musical explores issues of racial segregation and body image as a teenager, Tracy Turnblad, dreams of dancing on a popular TV show.
Characters: Tracy Turnblad, Edna Turnblad, Link Larkin, Velma Von Tussle.

Name: Dear Evan Hansen
Content: The musical revolves around Evan Hansen, a high school student with social anxiety, who gets caught in a web of lies after a classmate's death.
Characters: Evan Hansen, Connor Murphy, Zoe Murphy, Cynthia Murphy.

Name: The Sound of Music
Content: A classic musical about a young woman, Maria, who becomes a governess for a widowed naval captain's seven children and brings joy and music back into their lives.
Characters: Maria, Captain von Trapp, Liesl, Rolf.

Name: A Chorus Line
Content: Set during an audition for a Broadway show, the musical explores the lives and aspirations of the performers, focusing on their individual stories.
Characters: Zach, Cassie, Diana Morales, Paul.

Name: Grease
Content: A high-energy musical set in the 1950s, Grease follows the romantic relationship between greaser Danny and good girl Sandy at Rydell High School.
Characters: Danny Zuko, Sandy Olsson, Rizzo, Kenickie.

Name: Sweeney Todd: The Demon Barber of Fleet Street
Content: A dark and atmospheric musical about the vengeful barber Sweeney Todd, who seeks revenge against those who wronged him.
Characters: Sweeney Todd, Mrs. Lovett, Judge Turpin, Johanna.

Name: Mary Poppins
Content: Based on the books by P.L. Travers, Mary Poppins is a magical and whimsical nanny who brings joy and order to the Banks family in London.
Characters: Mary Poppins, Bert, Mr. Banks, Jane Banks, Michael Banks.

Name: Matilda the Musical
Content: Adapted from Roald Dahl's novel, the musical tells the story of Matilda, a precocious girl with telekinetic powers, who stands up to the oppressive adults in her life.
Characters: Matilda, Miss Trunchbull, Miss Honey, Mr. Wormwood, Mrs. Wormwood.

Name: Evita
Content: A musical about the rise to power and life of Eva Perón, the wife of Argentine President Juan Perón, and her journey from poverty to fame.
Characters: Eva Perón, Che, Juan Perón.

Name: Fiddler on the Roof
Content: Set in the Russian village of Anatevka, the musical explores the challenges faced by Tevye, a Jewish milkman, as he tries to maintain his traditions and family values.
Characters: Tevye, Golde, Tzeitel, Motel.

Name: Once
Content: A musical about an Irish street musician and a Czech immigrant who bond over their shared love of music in Dublin.
Characters: Guy, Girl.

Name: Cabaret
Content: Set in 1931 Berlin during the rise of the Nazis, the musical takes place in the decadent Kit Kat Klub and follows the lives of its inhabitants.
Characters: Sally Bowles, the Emcee, Cliff Bradshaw.

Name: Annie
Content: A heartwarming musical about a young orphan named Annie, who captures the heart of a billionaire and experiences a life of luxury.
Characters: Annie, Daddy Warbucks, Miss Hannigan, Grace Farrell.

Name: Into the Woods
Content: A mash-up of several fairy tales, the musical intertwines the stories of familiar characters as they venture into the woods to fulfill their wishes.
Characters: The Baker, The Baker's Wife, Cinderella, Little Red Riding Hood, Jack.

Name: Guys and Dolls
Content: Set in the world of New York City gamblers, the musical revolves around the romantic entanglements between high-rolling gambler Sky Masterson and Salvation Army worker Sarah Brown.
Characters: Sky Masterson, Sarah Brown, Nathan Detroit, Miss Adelaide.
